Ah! You wish to have a Dualsword made? That is our specialty! In fact, we can make every type of Dualsword!
If there's anyone better than us, it could only be the legendary Blacksmith of Mammon!
Just bring me the swords you want combined as well as the fee.
Make sure the swords are either Regular, Standard or Rare.
Regular weapons must be combined with other Regular weapons, Standard weapons must be combined with other Standard weapons, and Rare weapons must be combined with other Rare weapons.
Remember that if you invest some kind of a skill in a weapon, you can't combine it with another.
Remember as well that an Enchanted weapon loses its effect once it is combined with another, unless speical method it not used.
Which Dualsword would you like? Select one now.

Special Dual Craft with enchantment preservation. Regular Dual Craft with enchantment loss.
